name: Monsters 'n Girls
description: Three years ago, there was a war between humans and monster girls… A massive army of monmosu led by a succubus queen raided earth, raping men and converting women into soldiers of lust! To bring back peace, Nakamura, an archangel, blesses a lowly knight that goes by the name Sir Satou. He hopes that he may take up his lance and return peace to the world!​
